snippet.title: Regency Love: Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
A teaser trailer of Regency Love, an interactive story-telling game for the iPhone/iPod touch/iPad. Available from 16 December 2013.

To find out more, visit http://teaforthreestudios.com/regency-love/

We're hosting a giveaway of the game, which you can enter at http://teaforthreestudios.com/2013/12/giveaway-regency-love/

Show your support for Regency Love by liking our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/RegencyLove

Finally, don't forget to check us out on Twitter (@TeaForThreeTime) and Facebook (TeaForThreeStudios). Thanks for watching!
